strings.v: Percentage of damage received from hits get converted into ADRENALINE (also applies to Blocked hits). ADRENALINE can be converted back into HEALTH by landing successful hits against the opponent.
ALLIANCE ENERGY
Alliance Energy is used to move between tiles in Alliance Quests.
Loyalty is earned by participating in an Alliance. Use Loyalty to purchase the Alliance Crystal or exclusive items from the Store.
LOYALTY
WAR ENERGY
War Energy is used to move between tiles in Alliance Wars.
Glory is earned by participating in Alliance Quests. Redeem Glory for rare Upgrade Items in the Store.
Difficulty is the relative difficulty and complexity based on the easiest Alliance Quest.
Add points to your Event Score by dealing damage to enemies. Harder enemies award more points.
Multiplier is the relative score increase based on the easiest Alliance Quest.
Prestige is based on your Alliance power and effectiveness. A higher Prestige rating rewards your Alliance with higher scores per quest.
Earn milestone and rank rewards based on your Alliance's performance. Earn smaller rewards per Alliance Quest based on map completion.

Crystal Shard
Crystals contain useful items. They may be opened at the Collector's Crystal Vault.

GOLD

UNITS

ITEM
Earn Klyntar Strands by participating in Special Events. Klyntar Strands can be used to purchase unique items in the Klyntar Strand Store.
KLYNTAR STRANDS
Spend Mastery Points to enhance your Champions by opening the Mastery page in your Summoner Profile.
Upgrade Items
Used to unlock a specific Arena and will no longer be of use once the Arena has completed.
MULTIVERSE ARENA TICKET
Battle Chips may be used to unlock Versus Arenas or purchase exclusive crystals.
BATTLE CHIPS
Battle Chips are earned in Versus battles. They may be used to unlock Versus Arenas or purchase exclusive crystals.
Earn Pym Canisters by participating in Special Events, Daily Quests and Arenas. Pym Canisters can be used to purchase various items in the Pym Store.
PYM CANISTERS

MASTERY POINTS
SELECTABLE REWARD
SELECTABLE REWARD CLAIM
Earn Valor by participating in Special Events and increase your ranking in the Valor Leaderboard. Valor can also be used to purchase various items in the Valor Store.
VALOR
Collect Experience Points to increase your Summoner Level and unlock new features.
EXPERIENCE

Use Catalysts to rank up your Champions!
 Catalysts are most commonly found in Event Quests.

There are six Champion Classes:
 Cosmic, Mutant, Mystic, Science, Skill, and Tech.

Each Champion Class is strong against another.
Choose Class match-ups that give your Champions the advantage!

1-Star and 2-Star Champions unlock
new Special Attacks by Ranking Up!

In Quest Mode, your Champions' health persists between fights. 
If a Champion's health gets too low, use a Potion to heal them!

If one of your Champions is knocked out in a fight,
use a Revive Potion to get them back on their feet!

Get new Champions by opening Crystals
in the Crystal Vault!

Make your Champions more powerful by
 Upgrading them with ISO-8!
Special Attacks deal devastating damage to your opponent!

Remember to Block!
Blocking significantly reduces incoming damage.
When you find a Chest, you can't open it until you complete the quest. Defeat the boss to claim your reward!

You can use a Heavy Attack to break through
 your opponent's block!

When you run out of Quest Energy,
 you can use an Energy Refill to get back into the action!

Some Special Attacks can trigger powerful Status Effects
that give you the edge in the fight!

Stuck on a Quest?
Upgrade your Champions to shift the odds in your favor!

Bleed damage ignores Armor and Resistances, 
but some Champions do not bleed.
Critical Hits deal bonus damage and ignore a portion of opponents' armor to deal massive damage!

Armor reduces damage from attacks,
 but watch out for Armor Break reducing your Armor!

Champions can activate Synergy Bonuses
 by teaming up with friends, teammates, rivals, and more!

Class ISO-8 is more effective
 when used on a Champion of the same Class.

You'll need Gold, ISO-8 and Catalysts
 to unlock the full potential of your Champions.

Abilities that inflict Bleed or Armor Break
 are effective counters to armored Champions.

The Nullify ability instantly removes the target's Buff effects,
such as Regeneration, Armor Up, or Fury.
Fully explore each Quest to receive bonus loot!

Check back every day for new Event Quests
 with exclusive rewards!

The Stash stores gifts and excess inventory items.
 Be sure to collect them before they expire!
All Champions have an Ability Accuracy attribute which modifies the listed chance that an ability will trigger. The default is 100% of the listed chance.
Challenge Rating is determined by the Tier and Rank of your Champion. It governs the potency of many attributes and abilities.

When Blocking, some Champions have a chance to Perfect Block,
which reduces all incoming damage to zero!
Hero Rating represents the overall power level of your Champion, including any active bonuses.

In a fight, fill your Power Meter by taking and dealing damage.
 Save up Power to unleash devastating Special Attacks!

Some Champions' attacks can Stun their opponents,
 rendering them unable to attack, block, or even move!

Scout the path ahead on quests. You don't want to run into enemies
 too powerful for your team. Come back later and crush them!

Out of Quest Energy? Try Versus Mode!
 You can take on other players and earn exclusive rewards.

In Quests, Gates block paths to greater rewards.
 You'll need to have the right Champion in your team to unlock them.

In Quests, Potions and Revives can be used
 as soon as you find them!

The Contest grants Mutant Champions
 a Class Bonus against Skill.

The Contest grants Science Champions
 a Class Bonus against Mystic.

The Contest grants Mystic Champions
 a Class Bonus against Cosmic.

The Contest grants Cosmic Champions
 a Class Bonus against Tech.

The Contest grants Skill Champions
 a Class Bonus against Science.

The Contest grants Tech Champions
 a Class Bonus against Mutant.

Watch out! If your opponent has
 a Class Bonus, you also receive a penalty.

Some Champions have the ability to Regenerate
 their Health during a fight.
The Concussion ability reduces Ability Accuracy which reduces the listed trigger chance for abilities.
Mix Light and Medium Attacks to create Combos!
Armor Up, Power Drain, and Heal Block are common abilities of Tech Champions.
Bleed, Regeneration, and Special Attack Damage are common abilities of Mutant Champions.
Bleed and Critical Hits are common abilities of Skill Champions.
Evasion and Debuffs are common abilities of Science Champions.
Nullify and Power Gain are common abilities of Mystic Champions.
Buffs and True Damage are common abilities of Cosmic Champions.

Battle Chips are only found in Versus mode.
 Use them to purchase exclusive Crystals.
Some Champions are fully immune to certain status effects.

Loyalty is earned by participating in an Alliance.
Use Loyalty to purchase the Alliance Crystal or exclusive items from the Store.

Join an Alliance for access to chat,
to receive help, and the ability to purchase the Alliance Crystal.

There is a limit to how much Loyalty
can be earned in a day from help, but you can still send help after the limit is reached!

Asking your Alliance for help while
questing will award you with energy!

Asking your Alliance for help in Versus
will reduce that Champion's cooldown!

When your Champion is out of stamina in Versus, 
you can ask your Alliance for help.

When you are out of energy, 
you can ask your Alliance for help in Quests.

Swipe the chat window from side to side
to easily change chat channels.

Tap on the help icon on each Champion
in Versus Team Select to quickly ask your Alliance for help!

Activate Summoner Masteries to enhance your Champions.
Access Masteries through the Summoner Profile.

Recover your Mastery Points as often as you'd like
to create optimal setups for every game mode!

You can Duel another Summoner's Top Champion
 from their Summoner Profile.
Duel Credits refresh daily and are used to challenge another Summoner's Top Champion.
Join an Alliance to participate in exclusive Alliance Events and Arenas.
You can view your Duel Stats on your Profile page.

The Alliance Treasury holds resource donations from
its members. Treasury funds are used to start Alliance Quests.

Alliance Energy isn't used up when travelling
down a path that another player has visited.

Fights in Alliance Quests are locked to one player.
Any damage dealt persists, so deal as much damage as possible!

In Alliance Quests, defeat enemies on Linked
and Global tiles to make fights easier for your allies!

The fee to start an Alliance Quest grows based
on the Alliance's size and power but so do the rewards.

Prestige represents Alliance Quest difficulty
and score potential. Win Alliance Quests to earn more score!

Use communication and strategy in Alliance Quests.
Work as a team to fully explore each one!

Is an ally stuck in an Alliance Quest?
Send them an item to help them on their way!

Alliance Quests limit the number of items that
can be used per quest. Carefully choose which items you use!

Alliance Quests last a set amount of time, even
if the final boss is defeated.
Even with superpowers, Champions may only adventure through one Quest at a time. Try different teams to succeed in both Story and Alliance Quests.

Spectate Battlegroups to see their quest progress.
Chat and help them strategize!
Your Battlegroup rewards must be claimed from the stash. They aren't automatically awarded when the Alliance Quest ends.
Prestige is based off of the top Champions of each Alliance member.

Unlocked Alliance Quest maps are more difficult,
but award more total score.
Some quests hide the information of enemies in the Battlerealm. Fight them to uncover their true identity!
Moving to the final tile of an Alliance Quest will release your Champions for use in other quests.
During Placement phase in an Alliance War, the Leader and Officers can swap the placement of any Champion.
Champions used in an Alliance War Placement phase can't be used in Attack phase.

Teams used in an Alliance War are released
 when the Battlegroup boss is defeated.
Alliance Quests and Wars use Alliance potions and revives.
Use boosts to give your Champions a temporary edge in any fight!
A higher War Rating results in greater Alliance War rewards.

Alliance War rewards must be claimed from the stash
once the War is complete.

Alliance Wars require a minimum number of members 
in the Alliance to participate.
Alliance Quest and Alliance War results contain an Overview that details member performance.
Looking for a new Alliance? Head to the official forums or search through Recommended Alliances.
Ranged attacks like beams, bullets, or bolts of lightning won't trigger abilities that require making contact with your target.
Individual effectiveness in Alliance Wars is represented by a percentage. The greater the percentage, the more that player contributed relative to others!
Loading web cartridges...
Charging Arc Reactors...
Ignoring Deadpool...
Taking over S.H.I.E.L.D. from the inside...
Hailing Hydra...
Trying to lift Mjolnir...
Figuring out which one is the real Loki...
Coming up with 12% of a plan...
Hoarding all the Tier 4 Class Catalysts...
Combining Deadpool with other Champions...
Making Hosts of Hoggoth hoary...
Rebooting Cerebro...
Selling excess Pym Canisters...
Updating M.O.D.O.K.'s operating system...
Polishing crystals...
Reconstructing catalysts...
Enraging Bruce Banner...
Doing whatever a spider can...
Helping Cap understand that reference...
Sharpening Guillotine's Sword...
Assembling Avengers...

Tap and drag to swap Champions on your team.

BASIC HERO
Push for bigger scores to increase your rank. High ranking alliances earn more valuable rewards and are promoted to more competitive brackets.
Earn Conqueror Rewards by defeating the boss at the end of the map.

This quest contains Gates.

Gate conditions will need to be met upon every entry, unless the Gate is Destructible.

Destructible Gates remain permanently unlocked after entering them once.

Available Champions can be used in any other game mode. Locked Champions, however, are restricted from participating in other modes.

Champions used in an Alliance Quest may be locked out of other game modes until the Alliance Quest is completed or expired.

Each icon represents a game mode that locked Champions can't participate in:
None - Champions can participate in all game modes.
HERO LIMITATIONS
This item can only be purchased a limited number of times, and the cost of the item increases with each purchase. The purchase limit and cost reset when the timer expires.
STORY & EVENT QUESTS
